snippet: Dempster, 36, said he was stepping away for physical reasons and to spend more time with his family. But he left a slight opening to play in 2015.
abstract: Boston Red Sox pitcher Ryan Dempster plans to take this season off to focus on his health and spend more time with his family; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Dempster, 36, said he was stepping away for physical reasons and to spend more time with his family. But he left a slight opening to play in 2015.
